content: Rephrase this with 100% no plagiarism and uniquely simple words It is also noteworthy that several other tombs were discovered at the site, including those of a priest named Khnumdjedef, a judge and writer named Fetek, a priest who might have been named Messi, and a royal official named Meri. Meri's tomb is of particular interest since he held the title of "the keeper of the secrets."
